title: Real-World Challenges and Ethical AI in Finance
instructions: Design your own set of ethical guidelines for how AI should be used in finance. Include rules that ensure fairness, transparency, and privacy.

questions.question: What rules should AI systems follow to ensure fairness in financial decisions?
What guidelines should be in place to ensure transparency in how AI makes financial recommendations or decisions?
What privacy protections should be required when AI uses personal or financial data?
